text: Eric Newby (1919-2006) was an English writer and traveler.Guardian 2006 Obituary for Eric Newby He traveled to many parts of Europe, South Asia and Central Asia. He is best known for his famous and very enjoyable books like The Last Grain of Rice (1956), A Short Walk in the Hindu Kush (1958), Slowly down the Ganges (1966), Love and War in the Appenines (1971), A Small Place in Italy (1994). ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2006 deaths Category:English writers
title: Eric Newby
